titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the House of Peeres now assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the knights, gentlemen, freeholders, and other inhabitants of the county of Surrey, with above 2000 hands.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.L. for T. Bates,

notesStmt.note: "Presented with the consent and approbation of the honourable House of Commons. Feb. 5. 1641 [i.e. 1642]"--colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
